# AF/MF SETTING ## RELEASE/FOCUS PRIORITY Choose how the camera focuses in focus mode **AF-S** or **AF-C**. | Option | Description | |--------|-------------| | RELEASE | Shutter response is prioritized over focus. Pictures can be taken when the camera is not in focus. | | FOCUS | Focus is prioritized over shutter response. Pictures can be only taken when the camera is in focus. | ## AF RANGE LIMITER Limit the range of available focus distances for increased focus speed. | Option | Description | |---------|-------------| | OFF | Focus limiter disabled. | | CUSTOM | Limit focus to a range of distances defined by a minimum and maximum.
â€¢ **OK**: Limit focus to the selected range.
â€¢ **SET**: Choose two objects and limit focus to the distance between them. | | PRESET1 | Limit focus to a preset range. | | PRESET2 | Limit focus to a preset range. | > ðŸ’¡ **Note:** > - The values listed and displayed for the focus limiter may differ from the actual focus distance. > ðŸ’¡ **Additional Operations:** > - You can tap objects in the touch screen display to choose the focus range. > - Instead of tapping an object in the display, you set the maximum focus distance to infinity by rotating the focus ring.
